postgresql_postgresql_grant.description: Creates and manages privileges given to a user for a database schema.

role.description: The name of the role to grant privileges on.

database.description: The database to grant privileges on for this role.

schema.description: The database schema to grant privileges on for this role.

object_type.description: The PostgreSQL object type to grant the privileges on (one of: table, sequence).

privileges.description: The list of privileges to grant.
